name: SceatMulti
title: Sceat Multi
author: Sceat
description:
I MADE THIS MOD FAST FOR MY PERSONAL USE, IF YOU'RE INTERESTED IN THE FEATURES CONTACT ME ON TWITTER @Sceat_ SO I CAN HELP YOU START A GAME WITH IT
- Separate spawn
- Death messages, Researchs and chat is shared
- Prevent griefing
- When a player is offline, his buildings can't be destroyed, and enemies will stop attacking
- Forces shares chart around players
- Real time player list
